title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. VII, pt. 201 - Procedural Regulations Governing Hearings Held Under The New York Franchise Sales Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. VII, pt. 201 - Procedural Regulations Governing Hearings Held Under The New York Franchise Sales Act

State Regulations
§ 201.1 - Scope of part
§ 201.2 - Opportunity to be heard
§ 201.3 - Notice of hearing
§ 201.4 - Service of notice of hearing, orders and other communications
§ 201.5 - Personal appearance; representation by attorney
§ 201.6 - Hearing officers; assignment of hearings
§ 201.7 - Hearings to be public; stenographic record of hearings
§ 201.8 - Application for adjournment
§ 201.9 - Amendment of notice of hearing
§ 201.10 - Conduct of hearing; powers of hearing officer
§ 201.11 - Opportunity to testify and cross-examine; issuance of subpoenas
§ 201.12 - Interrogatories
§ 201.13 - Oral argument; briefs
§ 201.14 - Hearing officer's report; exceptions to report
§ 201.15 - Petition to reopen hearing
§ 201.16 - Orders of the attorney general

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. VII, pt. 201

Statutory authority: General Business Law, art. 33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
